body_html:
No, I have only cuda 7.5 installed. In bazel cache, I can also see that it picks up the right cuda:

 ❯ pwd
.../.bazel-cache/107ff11f0584ee207e19ea91624e574d/external/local_config_cuda/cuda
 ❯ ls
bin  extras  include  lib64  nvvm  BUILD  build_defs.bzl  cuda_config.h  platform.bzl
 ❯ ls -alh include/cuda_fp16.h
lrwxrwxrwx 1 user users 39 Nov  1 10:20 include/cuda_fp16.h -> /usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cuda_fp16.h
 ❯ grep half2half2 include/cuda_fp16.h -2
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half __high2half(const __half2 h);
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half2 __halves2half2(const __half l, const __half h);
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half2 __half2half2(const __half lh);
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half2 __floats2half2_rn(const float f1, const float f2);
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half2 __float22half2_rn(const float2 f);
--
   return val;
}
__CUDA_FP16_DECL__ __half2 __half2half2(const __half lh)
{
   __half2 val;
